pages.text: $(item)Chalk$() is used to draw $(thing)Sigils$() on the ground. This basic chalk has few uses, and drawing circles by hand is tedious.
Once you get your chalk, you can upgrade it using a simple crafting ritual!$(br2)Please use JEI to find recipes for future crafting rituals.

This first ritual infuses $(item)Arcania Essence$() into your chalk to create $(item)Magic Chalk$() which can automatically draw circles for you.$(br2)Start by drawing a sigil circle with a radius of 2, and sneaking to place a $(thing)Sigil Center$() in the middle.

pages.name: 2-Radius Circle
pages.text: Throw on 3 $(item)Arcania Essence$() and a $(item)Chalk$(), then click the center to begin!
Wait a sec while it crafts and you should soon get your $(item)Magic Chalk$()!$(br2)If it's not working, check out $(l:elisesmagic:rituals/2_troubleshooting)Troubleshooting$().
